mapper.sql: FROM u_role r WHERE r.status = %{CloseStatus.OPEN} AND ( EXISTS (SELECT ur.roleId FROM u_user_role ur WHERE r.id = ur.roleId AND ur.userId = #{userId} ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT gr.roleId FROM u_group_role gr INNER JOIN u_user u ON u.groupId = gr.groupId WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND r.id = gr.roleId ) ) ORDER BY r.sort DESC, r.createTime DESC
mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.name, r.sort, r.status FROM u_role r LEFT JOIN u_group_role gr ON r.id = gr.roleId WHERE r.status = %{CloseStatus.OPEN} AND gr.groupId = #{groupId} ORDER BY r.sort DESC, r.createTime DESC
